name: JoP - Jewelry of Power
description:
JoP - Jewelry of Power

In his spacecraft, lost, alone and looking for powerful jewels.
But you did not expect them to be in enemy territory. Enemies are willing to eliminate it anyway.

In space, you will find five jewels.
Jewel of Power (Purple): Gives the power to resist and destroy enemy ships.
Space Jewel (Blue): Increases your speed.
Time Jewel (Green): Make time turn around, giving you time to rethink your moves.
Soul Jewel (Yellow): Summon three small ships that chase enemy ships and destroy them. They are extremely fast.
Jewel of Reality (Red): Destroy all enemy ships.
